resources.string: Together we can save lives and stop people losing their job.
We are a team of developers who, just like you, are concerned about Coronavirus, and want to do something to limit its spreading however we can
This app is able to anonymously monitor your distance from other devices. It is able to check all the devices which have been at less than 2 meters away from you

If we see that you currently are or have been close to a device whose owner has been diagnosed with Coronavirus in the past two weeks, we will notify you straightaway, informing you on what steps to follow next, as suggested from the Government
In order to detect the interactions between yours and other devices, we will need your permission to use Bluetooth
To see the welcome slider again, goto Settings -> apps -> welcome slider -> clear data
